about.title: About Us
about.text: is where curiosity meets creation. Our mission is to inspire people through the discovery of iconic brands and their fascinating stories. From the roar of Ferrari engines to the fine craftsmanship of Lindt chocolate, we bring you closer to excellence. We organize authentic factory tours where innovation, art, and passion intertwine. Join us and experience the essence of excellence in motion.

arduino.title: Arduino
arduino.desc: Discover where technology meets imagination. Visit Arduino’s headquarters and witness how open-source innovation is shaping the world of electronics.

ferrari.title: Ferrari
ferrari.desc: Step into the world of speed and excellence. Explore Ferrari’s legendary factory and see how passion turns into performance.

lindt.title: Lindt
lindt.desc: Taste the tradition of Swiss perfection. Visit Lindt’s factory and discover the artistry behind the world’s most beloved chocolate.

aurora.title: Aurora
aurora.desc: Explore the fine art of Italian pen-making. At Aurora, every pen tells a story of precision, elegance, and timeless craftsmanship.

guido_gobino.title: Guido Gobino
guido_gobino.desc: Experience the magic of handmade chocolate from Turin. Witness how Guido Gobino combines heritage and creativity in every piece.

bending_spoons.title: Bending Spoons
bending_spoons.desc: Enter Italy’s most innovative tech hub. See how Bending Spoons creates world-class digital experiences for millions worldwide.

cailler.title: Cailler
cailler.desc: Delve into Switzerland’s oldest chocolate brand. Cailler invites you on a sensory journey through tradition and flavor.

contact.title: Join the Experience
contact.text:
Step inside the world of true craftsmanship. 
Register now to be part of our exclusive Factour experiences — private factory visits, artisan workshops, and behind-the-scenes journeys across Italy and beyond. 
Limited spots. Unlimited impressions. Your story begins inside.
